channel.title: Free Legal Intellij IDEA
channel.description:
I figured what the hell? Might as well apply for an open source license for IDEA to use for cherokee. So it was approved, and now all of the developers can use it for free and legally in the development of cherokee if you wish. Enjoy, and post any problemos you have.
IMPORTANT: THIS IS TO CERTIFY THE RIGHT TO USE THE JETBRAINS SOFTWARE PRODUCT, GRANTED BY JETBRAINS S.R.O. UNDER THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THE LICENSE AGREEMENT INCLUDED WITH THE SOFTWARE. PLEASE SAVE A COPY OF THIS EMAIL FOR FUTURE REFERENCES. ========LICENSE DETAILS======== Type: 1-Year Open Source Date of Issue: 18 October 2007 Expiration Date: 18 October 2008 Number of Authorized Users: not limited * Please quote this reference in any correspondence sent to JetBrains ============LICENSEE============ Name: CherokeeEngine Customer ID: 100526 Address: ========SOFTWARE PRODUCT======== Product Name: IntelliJ IDEA Licensed Version(s): 6.0 and any generally available new release Media: Electronic. The software is available for download from: http://www.jetbrains.com/idea/download/ ==========INSTALLATION========== Run the software and follow the Installation Wizard's instructions. To access the software, enter the User Name and a license key into the registration dialog. If you are running the software on your computer with a different key, please go to the "Help |Register..." menu to install the new license key: User Name: CherokeeEngine License key 1: 100526-ZZOW2-HNYMO-OZ257-7TWR3-ZI3R1 The license key allows for use of the Software by multiple concurrent users. ===DOCUMENTATION AND SUPPORT=== Documentation: http://www.jetbrains.com/idea/documentation/ FAQ and Knowledge Base: http://www.jetbrains.com/support/idea/ Newsgroups: news://news.intellij.net To check for availability of new releases, please visit www.jetbrains.com/idea For questions and upgrades, please contact: mailto:sales@jetbrains.com Sales Team JetBrains Inc http://www.jetbrains.com "Develop with pleasure!"

item.title: Free Legal Intellij IDEA
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Silver Lining:

No offense, but what’s the point? As far as I know, we are all already using IDEA.

I didn’t happen to have a serial for v7, and there was no harm in trying.

Read full topic

item.title: Free Legal Intellij IDEA
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

yakman:

[quote author=Silver Lining link=topic=211209.msg1849964#msg1849964 date=1193551049]As far as I know, we are all already using IDEA.

nope, i use Eclipse.
its kind of hypocrisy that IDEA supports open source projects, but isnt open source itself[/quote]hardly, there is a time and a place for open source software and commercial software is not one of them. but lets not turn this into an open source debate

Read full topic

@moparisthebest wrote:

I figured what the hell? Might as well apply for an open source license for IDEA to use for cherokee. So it was approved, and now all of the developers can use it for free and legally in the development of cherokee if you wish. Enjoy, and post any problemos you have.

IMPORTANT: THIS IS TO CERTIFY THE RIGHT TO USE THE JETBRAINS SOFTWARE PRODUCT, GRANTED BY JETBRAINS S.R.O. UNDER THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THE LICENSE AGREEMENT INCLUDED WITH THE SOFTWARE. PLEASE SAVE A COPY OF THIS EMAIL FOR FUTURE REFERENCES.

To access the software, enter the User Name and a license key into

menu to install the new license key:

License key 1: 100526-ZZOW2-HNYMO-OZ257-7TWR3-ZI3R1

The license key allows for use of the Software by multiple concurrent
users.
